command.description: The command to execute on the entity.
command.markdownDescription: The command to execute on the entity.

type.description:
[Entity Action Type](../entity_action_types.md)

Executes a command with the entity as the source (i.e. `@s` will select the entity itself).

Type ID: `origins:execute_command`
